title: Executive Order 7412-Modifying Proclamation No. 2175 of June 15, 1936, Establishing the Bienville National Forest, Mississippi
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 4, 1897, 30 Stat. 34, 36 (U.S.C., title 16, sec. 473), it is ordered that the description of the land contained in Proclamation No. 2175 of June 15, 1936, establishing the Bienville National Forest, Mississippi, be, and it is hereby, modified so that the land described therein as being in T. 7 N., R. 8 W., Choctaw, Meridian, shall be described as being in T. 7 N.,  R. 8 E., Choctaw, Meridian.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7412-Modifying Proclamation No. 2175 of June 15, 1936, Establishing the Bienville National Forest, Mississippi Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/357307
